titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 212 (Roll no. 537).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 40. Record Vote Number: 196.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that, when the House adjourns on the legislative day of Thursday, July 31, 2008, Friday, August 1, 2008, or Saturday, August 2, 2008, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, September 8, 2008. Declares that, when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Friday, August 1, 2008, through Friday, September 5, 2008, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, September 8, 2008.
